titleStmt.title: SII 7.788: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 788. (A.R. No. 163 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE, LEFT OF ENTRANCE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇara puvimātu vaḷara nāmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa taṉ ṉirupa
ṉṉavar cūṭa maṉṉiya Urimaiyāl maṇimuṭi cūṭi ceṅkol ceṉṟu ticaitoṟum vaḷaṟpa veṅkali niṅki
meyyaṟan taḻaippak kaliṅka miriyak kaṭalmalai naṭātti valaṅkoḷ ḷāḻi varai yāḻi naṭātti Irucuṭaraḷavum Orukuṭai ni
ḻaṟṟic cempoṉ vīrasiṁhāsaṉattu tiripuvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭu viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripanmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaśakkaravartti
kaḷ śrīvikkiramacoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu paṉniraṇṭāvatu perumpaṟṟappuliyūrk koyiliṉuḷḷāṟ tiyākacamuttirakkūṭattup paḷḷiccoṭṭai co
ḻakoṉiliruntu ceyyattiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉapaṭi rājarājavaḷanāṭṭuk kiḻaivaḻi Utavittirumāṇikuḻi mahādevar koyili leḻuntaruḷivitta vikkira
ma coḻaīśvaramuṭaiyāṟku veṇṭu nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka Iṉṉāṭṭu vāṉavaṉmātevipuramāṉa kulo
Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭumnilattukku nakarakkaṇakku tiruveṇṇainallūruṭaiyāṉ Appa n=tiruvaraṅkamuṭaiyāṉum kuṭimakkaḷil kuḷakkuṭaiyāṉ tillainā
yakamuventaveḷānum vaṭaceri Uṭaiyāṉ taraṇiviccātiramuventaveḷāṉum veḷiyūruṭaiyāṉ poreṟāṉa muṭikoṇṭacoḻamuventaveḷāṉum ve
ḷiyūruṭaiyāṉ veḷāṉ kiṇaṟaṉāṉa viranāraāyaṇamuventaveḷāṉum Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvarippaṭi vāṉavaṉmāte
vivatikku kiḻakku Arumpontaivākkālukku teṟku māṉakāntan Oṭaikku meṟku Irāje
ntracoḻavākkālukku vaṭakku naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa nilattil tirumāṇikuḻi māhātevarkku muṉpu
Ūrkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyāy varukiṟa nilam nikki nikkiniṉṟa nilattil Iṭum nirnilam Aṟuveliyi
ṉāl nilaopāti poṉ Eṇkaḻaiñcaraiye Iraṇṭu mañcāṭiyum nālumāvukku Eṟiṉa
vāṇṭaic celavopāti māṭai patināle mukkāle muṉṟumāvum Ivvūriṟ cu
The beginning of every line is built in by a modern wall.
Digital edition of SII 7.788 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
